thread.title: Excellent small hotel, great location, very good service
thread.title_full: Excellent small hotel, great location, very good service - Review of Saint Dominique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: pdick10
title: Excellent small hotel, great location, very good service
text: The St Dominique is well worth getting to know, whether you are a frequent or an infrequent visitor to Paris. Set in a quiet but classy street between Invalides & the Eiffel Tower, it is in exactly the right place for walking around the city. There are shops, cafes, bars & restaurants close by. The staff are extremely helpful & there's a good breakfast to set you up for the day.
